data.text: @DavidZipper Where have you seen the data for European and Asian countries?
@Bravado_5 @DavidZipper @asymco 2021 data not available yet for Canada

@DavidZipper Self declared "predators" doing everything within their means "to be feared" by citizens, children, our loved ones.

https://t.co/S7yFbHcWCK

@DavidZipper I have certainly seen a 5-10x increase in reckless, high speed driving here in LA since beginning of pandemic. Truly.

I don’t know what the cause is, but it “feels” like it’s something to do with having had a taste of empty freeways for a time. And we can’t turn off the impulse
@DavidZipper Yeah, been surprised how much we hear this, unfortunately 😞

@DavidZipper @asymco Even compared to Canada - which is as similar to the US as you can get- (even in car choices) the US is notable.

https://t.co/uQEBpnwawu

For example, traffic deaths in the European Union fell 17% in 2020 -- while rising 7% in the USA.

Did COVID somehow make American drivers crazier, and no one else?

https://t.co/5y2v8WRbgB https://t.co/R8Fw3bpYE0

@KostelecPlan @DavidZipper @asymco @NSCsafety To be fair, this actually is human error. Humans made an error when they designed and signed off on this #DeadlyByDesign #MultipleThreat uncontrolled marked crosswalk. https://t.co/wn4s1KPPui
